body_html:
1. If you are changing input size, you should also change corresponding model definition. Models in torchvision are for a particular input size (299x299 for inception_v3, 224x224 for everything else).
    2,3 looks like either insufficient shared memory or insufficient RAM issue.
body_text:
If you are changing input size, you should also change corresponding model definition. Models in torchvision are for a particular input size (299x299 for inception_v3, 224x224 for everything else).
2,3 looks like either insufficient shared memory or insufficient RAM issue.
body:
1. If you are changing input size, you should also change corresponding model definition. Models in torchvision are for a particular input size (299x299 for inception_v3, 224x224 for everything else).
2,3 looks like either insufficient shared memory or insufficient RAM issue.
